pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Ranking Color Scheme for Multiple Pairwise Comparisons // Implementation of the SRCS method for a color- based visualization of the results of multiple pairwise tests on a large number of problem configurations, proposed in: I.G. del Amo, D.A. Pelta. SRCS: a technique for comparing multiple algorithms under several factors in dynamic optimization problems. In: E. Alba, A. Nakib, P. Siarry (Eds.), Metaheuristics for Dynamic Optimization. Series: Studies in Computational Intelligence 433, Springer, Berlin/Heidelberg, 2012.
